verse.analysis.analysis_tree.AnalysisTree

class verse.analysis.analysis_tree.AnalysisTree(root)

Bases: object

Methods

contains(other[, strict, tol])

Returns, for reachability, whether the current tree fully contains the other tree or not; for simulation, whether the other tree is close enough to the current tree.

visualize_dot(filename[, otype, font])

filename is the prefix, i.e. doesn't include extensions.

dump

get_all_nodes

is_equal

leaves

load

visualize
__init__(root)
contains(other: AnalysisTree, strict: bool = True, tol: float | None = None) → bool

Returns, for reachability, whether the current tree fully contains the other tree or not; for simulation, whether the other tree is close enough to the current tree. strict: requires set of agents to be the same

visualize_dot(filename: str, otype: Literal['png', 'svg', 'pdf', 'jpg'] = 'png', font: str | None = None)

filename is the prefix, i.e. doesn’t include extensions. filename.dot will be saved as well as filename.png
